China to help NEV industry respond to foreign trade restrictionsChina's commerce ministry said on Wednesday it would encourage the new energy vehicle industry to "actively" respond to foreign trade restrictions and cooperate with overseas firms, amid a European probe into Chinese subsidies for the sector. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 03:33:58 GMT L5VEL5RXSFOMLO6MNJRK4WFVXU https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/china-help-nev-industry-respond-foreign-trade-restrictions-2024-02-07/Sarah Wu, Albee Zhang商业汽车与交通
Asia stocks gain, much riding on China stability effortsAsian stocks firmed on Wednesday as investors waited to see if Beijing's increasingly frantic efforts to prop up its sagging share markets would actually work, while bonds enjoyed a reprieve from recent selling. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 02:00:34 GMT 3TZINS4YKNNCVB4VEOJXPFDYSY https://www.reuters.com/markets/global-markets-wrapup-1-2024-02-07/Wayne Cole市场
Dollar on defensive after pullback from nearly 3-month peakThe dollar remained under pressure on Wednesday after retreating from a nearly three-month high against the euro in the previous session with a decline in U.S. bond yields adding to the drag. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 01:30:12 GMT DGB4YAWG7JOF7PN77VMXNQJ4CM https://www.reuters.com/markets/currencies/dollar-defective-after-pullback-nearly-3-month-peak-2024-02-07/Kevin Buckland市场货币
Chinese embassy in Netherlands says China would never allow cyberattacksChina would never allow any Chinese entities or individuals to conduct illegal activities such as cyberattacks or use Chinese facilities for such attacks, the Chinese embassy in the Netherlands said in a statement on Wednesday. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 01:17:43 GMT T3TGBM3QDBNMJNCWPV7HLOPRGI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinese-embassy-netherlands-says-china-would-never-allow-cyberattacks-2024-02-07/Reuters世界中国
Beijing calls for 'positive, objective, friendly' China policy from South KoreaChina hopes South Korea will pursue a "positive, objective and friendly" policy towards Beijing, foreign minister Wang Yi said in a phone call with his South Korean counterpart on Tuesday. Tue, 06 Feb 2024 23:54:26 GMT BCN4AWCMABLAVAI3F5FGOM2HRY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/beijing-calls-positive-objective-friend-china-policy-south-korea-2024-02-06/Reuters世界亚太地区
